DOC.brief_title: Differences Care Provided Intensive Care Units ( ICUs ) With Physician Versus Nurse Practitioner First Responders
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective cohort study perform two medical intensive care unit ( ICU ) . The goal compare outcomes patient receive care medical intensive care unit tertiary care facility two different model ; traditional model include resident , pulmonary fellow attend nontraditional model Nurse Practitioners direct care deliverer , pulmonary fellow , attend . Outcomes measured include ICU length stay , hospital length stay ICU discharge , ventilator day , daily spontaneous breathing trial , daily awaken trial , well mortality hospital discharge .
DOC.criteria: Patients admit designated ICU September 1 , 2007 September 30 , 2010 . Not admit designate ICU .
